text: Drie is a hamlet in the municipality of Ermelo in the province of Gelderland, the Netherlands. Drie, near Ermelo and Speuld, is situated in the forest, and has 11 inhabitants (2018). File:Boshuis in Drie.jpg|The Boshuis (Forest House) Drie Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Ermelo
title: Drie, Gelderland
